text: Briony Williams is an Australian actress. She is best known for her role as Joy, mother to Lockie and Phillip, in Lockie Leonard.Lockie Leonard on TV She has appeared in the film "Struck by Lightning", and the TV Series All Saints. She has also appeared in stage productions, including Macbeth.Macbeth - Wildfire Theatre ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%;" ! Year !! Film !! Role !! title: Briony Williams
